name: You Lost A Wagon Wheel
description:
The year is 1848...

And everyone wants to go to Oregon for some reason. Wagon Wheel doesn't want to go to Oregon. Wagon Wheel likes it in Missouri but no one ever asks Wagon Wheel what Wagon Wheel wants. So when an opportunity presents itself, our hero sets off on a journey back east. But was it really this hilly on the way here? Those storm clouds on the horizon don't seem very friendly either...
